```{r}
library(MASS)
Boston

library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
ggplot(Boston, aes(x = lstat, y = medv, color = crim)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_color_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red") +
  labs(title = "Median Home Value vs. % Lower-Status, colored by Crime",
       x     = "% Lower-Status (lstat)",
       y     = "Median Home Value (medv)",
       color = "Crime Rate") +
  theme_minimal()
```
